DescriptionData.Title: Snazaroo Burpo Stamp Sets - Holiday Set
DescriptionData.Description: Burpo Stamps feature large designs with clean lines that have been designed especially for face painting and are fast and easy to use, even by beginners. Set includes 7 popular holiday designs. Each design is approximately 2 inches square. Simply ink a Burpo rubber stamp on a washable stamp pad and apply picture outlines on a child's cheek. Then paint in the outline with a brush and facepaint palette. No artistic skills required! Burpo's child-safe ink washes off with soap and water and is child safe. Made in USA.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each design is approximately 2 inches square
Ink washes off with soap and water and is child safe
